title: Bedcover, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: chain and satin stitch embroidery, drawnwork
dimensions: H x W: 251.5 x 297.2 cm (8 ft. 3 in. x 9 ft. 9 in.)
description: Very large white bedcover with rounded corners at one end and embroidered in white cotton. Border design of flower and foliage in symmetrical flowing arrangement with special corner design. Detailed flower sprays cover the center. Variety of drawnwork patterns in leaves and flowers. The cover is pieced in the length and contains four pieces of varying sizes. The initials "A.V.P." are embroidered in red on one side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: chain and satin stitch embroidery, drawnwork. 1952-48-2.
